name: react-sequencer
description: Attempt at using React for this sequencer prototype!

scripts.build: API_URL=$'"http://159.203.75.254:5000"' NODE_ENV=production webpack -p --config webpack.production.config.js && NODE_ENV=production PORT=80 node server.prod.js
scripts.build-local: API_URL=$'"http://localhost:5000"' NODE_ENV=production webpack -p --config webpack.production.config.js && NODE_ENV=production PORT=3333 node server.prod.js
scripts.test: find ./src -name '*.test.js' | env API_URL=$'"http://localhost:5000"' NODE_ENV=test NODE_PATH=./src xargs mocha --require babel-core/register --compilers jpg:./mocha.config.js --compilers png:./mocha.config.js --compilers ico:./mocha.config.js -r mock-local-storage
scripts.test-watch: find ./src -name '*.test.js' | env API_URL=$'"http://localhost:5000"' NODE_ENV=test NODE_PATH=./src xargs mocha --require babel-core/register --compilers jpg:./mocha.config.js --compilers png:./mocha.config.js --compilers ico:./mocha.config.js -r mock-local-storage -w

author: Anson Kao <anson.kao@gmail.com>
